text: is a Japanese professional athlete. He is best known as a baseball player in Japan and in the American Major Leagues.BaseballReference.com, Kosuke Fukudome; retrieved 2012-7-22. ==Career== In the US, Fukudome is currently part of the New York Yankees team.Sullivan, Jeff. "Yankees Sign Kosuke Fukudome," SB Nation (US). July 13, 2012; retrieved 2012-7-22. He has played for the Chicago Cubs, the Cleveland Indians and Chicago White Sox.ESPN.com, Kosuke Fukudome; retrieved 2012-7-22. In Japan, Fukudome formerly played for the Chunichi Dragons of the Central League from 1998 to 2007. Fukudome was a member of the Japanese national baseball team which won a silver medal in the 1996 Summer Olympics, a bronze medal in the 2004 Summer Olympics.Sports Reference.com (SR/Olympics), "Kosuke Fukudome" ; retrieved 2012-7-22. ==References== ==Other websites== *Kosuke Fukudome at mlb.com Category:1977 births Category:Living people Category:Japanese baseball players Category:Chicago Cubs players Category:Olympic bronze medalists for Japan Category:Olympic silver medalists for Japan Category:National League All-Stars Category:People from Kagoshima Prefecture
title: Kosuke Fukudome
